alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Winona, Houston, northeastern Fillmore, La Crosse, northwestern Vernon and south central Trempealeau Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Goodview to near Rushford to near Lanesboro. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Trempealeau and Houston around 835 PM CDT. Caledonia, Dakota and Brice Prairie around 840 PM CDT. La Crosse, La Crescent, La Crosse Airport and French Island around 845 PM CDT. Onalaska, Holmen and Hokah around 850 PM CDT. West Salem and Brownsville around 855 PM CDT. Stoddard around 900 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 247 and 276. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
